Package controller

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Message
    Message interface that represents message (event) sent from View to Model.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BaseMessage
    Second design pattern used for message.
    FlagMessage
    Message sent from view to model for game state flags.
    GameInfo
    Setting flags for different possible states of game.
    GameOverMessage
    Sends message from view to model to indicate that the game is over and user lost.
    GameWonMessage
    Sends message from view to model to indicate that the game is over and user won.
    MinesweeperController
    Controller implementing Runnable class that performs actions based off various user inputs/interactions with game.
    NewGameMessage
    Extends BaseMessage and sends new game message from view to model.
    Pair<A,​B>
    Stores pair of generic objects.
    QuestionMessage
    Represents question message (event) sent from View to Model.
    RevealMessage
    Part of the controller and extends the BaseMessage class to reveal messages to the user based off their input.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ValveResponse
    Different valve responses.
